title: Finding out the pattern with Pascal's Triangle.
text: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is $$5$$.
speech: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is  5 .
pacedSpeech: We know that the variables in this pattern will follow the pattern in Pascal's triangle. You should use the row of Pascal's triangle where the second number is   5

title: Finding out the coefficients.
text: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are $$1$$, $$5$$, $$10$$, $$10$$, $$5$$, $$1$$.
speech: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are  1 ,  5 ,  10 ,  10 ,  5 ,  1 .
pacedSpeech: The coefficients according to Pascal's triangle are   1

title: Expanding the polynomial.
text: Use the formula: $${\left(a+b\right)}^n$$ $$=$$ $$a^n$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-1b^1$$ + $$___$$ $$a^n-2b^2$$ +... + $$___$$ $$a^1 b^n-1$$ + $$b^n$$ and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.
speech: Use the formula:  parentheses a plus b,  to the n-th   is equal to   a to the n-th  +  blank   a to the n-th minus 1 b to the first,  +  blank   a to the n-th minus 2 b squared,  +... +  blank  , a to the first b to the n-th minus, 1  +  b to the n-th  and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.
pacedSpeech: Use the formula:    a plus b,  to the n-th
a to the n-th minus 1 b to the first,
a to the n-th minus 2 b squared,
, a to the first b to the n-th minus, 1
and fill in the blanks with the values from Pascal's triangle.

title: Plugging in the coefficients.
speech: Plug in the  x ,  y, , and coefficents.

title: Simplify the equation.
text: Simplifying the equation results in the solution: $$x^5+10x^4+40x^3+80x^2+80x^1+32$$.
speech: Simplifying the equation results in the solution:  x to the fifth plus 10 x to the fourth, plus 40 x cubed, plus 80 x squared, plus 80 x to the first, plus 32 .
pacedSpeech: Simplifying the equation results in the solution:   x to the fifth plus 10 x to the fourth, plus 40 x cubed, plus 80 x squared, plus 80 x to the first, plus 32
